1200.name: The Meeting Room Of The Gods
1200.description:
The meeting room is plain and very simple. A circular table sits in the
middle of the room, lit by some unseen light source. There are many
chairs around the table, all empty. The Immortal Board Room is to the
north. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

north.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the north.

1201.name: The Inn Of The Gods
1201.description:
The Inn of the Gods is a small room, holding only a shelf with many
small precious stones on it. When a God comes to rent his belongings,
his essence is stored in the stones. The Immortal Board Room is to the
south. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch.

south.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the south.

east.description: The ice box lies to the east.

1202.name: The Ice Box Of The Gods
1202.description:
The Ice Box is for little boys and girls that cannot play nice. Be good
and maybe someone will come and get you. The ceiling hangs low overhead.
The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: The Inn of the Gods is to the west.

1203.name: The Gods' Mortal Board Room
1203.description:
Here the Gods have magically created an exact copy of the mortal board
room. Any God can easily post and read messages from the mortal board
room without being seen by any mortals. The Immortal Board Room is to
the west. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

west.description: The Immortal Board Room can be seen to the west.

1204.name: The Immortal Board Room
1204.description:
The main hang out of the Gods, the Immortal Board Room is the place to
be. Gods exchange messages here most every day. The mortal board room is
to the east and the meeting room for the gods is to the south. To the
north is the Gods' Inn and to the west is a post office for Gods. There
is a large staircase leading down to the main temple in the city of
Midgaard. In the northeast corner you spot a small staircase leading
upwards. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: The Gods' Inn can be seen just to the north.

east.description: The Mortal Board Room can be seen just to the east.

south.description: The Gods' Meeting Room is located to the south.

west.description: The Gods' Post Office is just to the west.

up.description: There is a small stair in the corner leading up to the social room of the Gods.

down.description: You see the hustle and bustle of the Temple of Midgaard at the bottom of the stairs.

1205.name: The Post Office Of The Gods
1205.description:
The Post Office Of The Gods is the same as most Post Offices except that
it is not as slow. Even the Postal service knows not to anger the Gods.
Piles of junk mail line the walls. I guess even Gods get on mailing
lists. The Immortal Board Room is to the east. The air is still and
musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The Immortal Board Room is just to the east.

1206.name: The Social Gathering Room
1206.description:
This elegantly decorated room has one simple purpose. To socialize with
everyone else around in one central location. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

down.description: The Immortal Board Room is just down through the floor.  Funny how you didn't notice that exit before isn't it?

1200.name: innkeeper
1200.long_desc: The Immortal Innkeeper is organizing her books here.
1200.description: She appears to be having no problem tallying things up.

1201.name: postmaster
1201.long_desc: The Immortal Postmaster is hard at work here.

1202.name: being
1202.long_desc: A strange amorphous being wanders these halls eternally cleaning.
1202.description:
This spirit, having lived out its days in the mortal world, now
works off its final sins by doing menial labour in this realm's
purgatory.  In this case, those chores seem to be cleaning up
after the immortals of the land.
